page.title: 13BROOK STREET PRIMARY SCHOOL.
page.content: There are eight teachers in our school, Mrs Macnish is the head teacher. Mr Bradshaw is our teacher. There are 182 children in the school.We have a music centre beside our school and music exams are taken there.School starts at 9:am and finishes at 3:30pm. The subject every one likes is science.P.E. is good specially on Thursdays when we go outside to do netball and football. Playtimes in the morning and afternoon are 15 minutes, dinner play is one hour. They are 29 people in our class, girls and boys. There are two play grounds, one infant and one junior yard. The girls are allowed in the infant yard. There are 2 halls, one for P.E. and the other for assembly and dinner. When it rains we stay in and draw or play a game.
